handleBack(ActionEvent) - Method in class chickfila.cashier.ControllerCashier
Handles the action of clicking the back button by loading the "start.fxml" file and setting the connection and menu properties of the controller.
handleBack(ActionEvent) - Method in class chickfila.manager.ControllerManager
This method is called when the "close" button is pressed in the UI.
handleCashier(ActionEvent) - Method in class chickfila.Controller
Handles the event when the "Cashier" button is clicked.
handleClick(ActionEvent) - Method in class chickfila.cashier.ControllerCashier
Handles the click of a menu item button and adds the corresponding item to the current order.
handleCompleteOrder() - Method in class chickfila.cashier.ControllerCashier
Completes the current order by inserting it into the database as a new order with paid status and current time, and updating the inventory for each order item.
handleInventory(OrderItem) - Method in class chickfila.cashier.ControllerCashier
Handles the inventory for a given order item by updating the quantity of each ingredient in the database.
handleManager(ActionEvent) - Method in class chickfila.Controller
Handles the event when the manager button is clicked.
handleNewOrder() - Method in class chickfila.cashier.ControllerCashier
 
hashCode() - Method in class chickfila.logic.inventory
Returns a hash code value for the inventory object, computed using its inventory item ID, quantity, and inventory item name.
hashCode() - Method in class chickfila.logic.menuItems
The hashCode() method returns the hash code value for this menu item.
hashCode() - Method in class chickfila.logic.orders
Returns a hash code value for this orders object.
hashCode() - Method in class chickfila.logic.sales
Returns the hash code value for this sales object.
